subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With his team still needing a star point guard, Donnie Walsh plans to call the Timberwolves, who drafted Ricky Rubio, who was ambivalent about playing in Minnesota.
snippet: With his team still needing a star point guard, Donnie Walsh plans to call the Timberwolves, who drafted Ricky Rubio, who was ambivalent about playing in Minnesota.
